fr.zelus.jarvis.plugins.github.platform.action

Class OpenIssue

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zelus.jarvis.core.RuntimeAction<GithubPlatform>
      • fr.zelus.jarvis.plugins.github.platform.action.OpenIssue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<RuntimeActionResult>

    public class OpenIssue
extends RuntimeAction<GithubPlatform>
    A RuntimeAction that opens a new issue on the given repository with the provided issueTitle and issueContent.

    This class relies on the GithubPlatform to access the Github API and authenticate the bot.

    Note: this class requires that its containing GithubPlatform has been loaded with valid Github credentials in order to authenticate the bot and access the Github API.

    See Also:
    GithubPlatform

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenIssue

        public OpenIssue(GithubPlatform runtimePlatform,
                 JarvisSession session,
                 String user,
                 String repository,
                 String issueTitle,
                 String issueContent)
        Constructs a new OpenIssue with the provided runtimePlatform, session, user, repository, issueTitle, and issueContent.

        This constructor accepts null as its issueContent parameter. In this case the opened issue will have an empty content.

        Parameters:
        runtimePlatform - the GithubPlatform containing this action
        session - the JarvisSession associated to this action
        user - the Github user managing the repository to open an issue in
        repository - the Github repository to open an issue in
        issueTitle - the title of the issue to open
        issueContent - the content of the issue to open
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided runtimePlatform, session, user, repository, or issueTitle is null

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        protected Object compute()
        Opens a new issue on the given repository with the provided issueTitle and issueContent.

        This method relies on the containing GithubPlatform to access the Github API, and will throw a JarvisException if the Jarvis Configuration does not define valid Github authentication credentials.

        Specified by:
        compute in class RuntimeAction<GithubPlatform>
        Returns:
        the created Issue
        Throws:
        JarvisException - if the GithubPlatform does not hold a valid Github API client (i.e. if the Jarvis Configuration does not define valid Github authentication credentials)
        See Also:
        GithubPlatform.getGithubClient()
